product_name: Lonely Planet Guides New England's Best Trips
long_description: Ready for the freedom of the open road, but need a few ideas? From Portsmouth to Cape Cod and beyond, Lonely Plant Guides. Authors: Mara Vorhees, Amy C. Balfour, Paula Hardy and Caroline Sieg. Softcover; 352 pages; color photographs and maps. Lonely Planet Publications; copyright 2013. Lonely Plant Guides. 32 road trips are sorted by state, and each state features 6 - 7 trips (Connecticut and Rhode Island are combined at feature 7 trips between the 2 states). Trips range in duration from 2 - 10 days, and each trip includes regional tips, exciting detours and out-of-the way gems.
short_description: Ready for the freedom of the open road, but need a few ideas? From Portsmouth to Cape Cod and beyond, Lonely Plant Guides New England's Best Trips offers 32 road trips throughout the region.
